price: Hao makao yao ni Jahannamu, na wala hawapati makimbilio kutoka humo.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ عَنۡهَا مَحِيصٗا
footnotes: Hakika hao walio zipoteza akili zao na wakafuata wasiwasi wa Shetani anao watia katika nafsi zao, mwisho wao ni kuendea Jahannamu, wala hawatapata njia ya kutoka huko.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhum jahannamu walā yajidūna ʿanhā maḥīṣan
